full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS SGRUB LA MA GSANG 'DUS THOD PHRENG RTZAL GYI SGOS SGRUB DANG 'BREL BA'I ZLUM PO BZHI'I DBANG BYANG SKAL LDAN RE SKONG BYIN RLABS 'DOD 'JO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CES THUGS SGRUB BLA MA GSANG 'DUS THOD PHRENG RTZAL GYI SGOS SGRUB DANG 'BREL BA'I ZLUM PO BZHI'I DBANG BYANG SKAL LDAN RE SKONG BYIN RLABS 'DOD 'JO ZHES BA 'DI NI, RIG 'DZIN GTER CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL POS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DOD 'JO BUM BZANGLAS GSUNGS PAS GZHI BYAS, RDZOGS CHEN GYI LAM 'BRAS DANG MTHUN PA'I DBANG DON MTHONG THOS SU GYUR BA TSAD THUB DU MAS BRGYAN TSOGS 'KHOR GYI SKOR RNAMS BLA MA GSANG 'DUS NAS BYUNG BA LTAR GYIS GSAR BRTZAMS BYAS TE SPEL BA'I BYED PA PO NI, DRIN CAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA GRUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE BAR BSKYANGS PAS DRIN LAS, GSAR RNYING GI CHOS TSUL DU MA'I GNAD LA THOS BSAM CUNG ZAD BGYIS PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'AM, GSANG MTSAN PADMA BZHAD DRAG RTZAL DU 'BOD PAS SKU 'BUM GSER TOG BLA BRANG GI GZIMS CHUNG BKRA SHIS GA-YANG 'KHYIL GYI YANG RTZER SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
